db:abstract.db:para: Using the document-oriented rich text engine.

db:article.db:para: Qt provides powerful document-oriented rich text engine that supports Unicode and right-to-left scripts. Documents can be manipulated using a cursor-based API, and their contents can be imported and exported as both HTML and in a custom XML format.

db:listitem.db:para: The Calendar example shows how to create rich text content and display it using a rich text editor.
The Order Form example shows how to generate rich text documents by combining a simple template with data input by the user in a dialog.
The Syntax Highligher example shows how to perform simple syntax highlighing.
The Text Edit example shows Qt's rich text editing facilities in action.
